snippet: The mayor of Rome is considering whether to stop using his bicycle to get around the city after local gangsters were heard in intercepted phone conversations saying that he needed to be driven from office or possibly even eliminated.
abstract: Rome's Mayor Ignazio Marino is urged by security officials to stop riding his bicycle around city after local gangsters are heard in intercepted phone conversations making veiled threats against him.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of Rome is considering whether to stop using his bicycle to get around the city after local gangsters were heard in intercepted phone conversations saying that he needed to be driven from office or possibly even eliminated.

headline.main: Italy: Mayor May Have to Hang Up His Bike
headline.print_headline: Italy: Mayor May Have to Hang Up His Bike
